item.title: Word Tricks
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: I just (re)discovered The Visual Thesaurus. Granted, they don't have a large data set yet, but I think the spider diagram is actually a very effective representation...much better than the traditional Roget's double look-up. Wonder how we could represent related recipes or similar chefs this way -- am I too obsessed that this was my first thought? (Met the founder of this company when he was working with my friend Cindy at Razorfish)
